attributes.action: update train stations payment to accept solo cards
attributes.action_prefix: We the undersigned petition the Prime Minister to
attributes.background: Train stations should accept solo and electron cards, these are the only cards that 16 and 17 year olds can get.

rejection.details: We suggest that you contact the train company or companies involved and petition them to change the methods of payment they accept.
reasons: Outside the remit of the Prime Minister and Government
